mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.couple_id, b.user_request, b.user_received, b.sub_term, b.start_date FROM user_info a LEFT OUTER JOIN couple_info b ON a.user_id = b.user_request OR a.user_id = b.user_received WHERE a.email = #{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_info WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_info WHERE nickname = #{nickname}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info (user_id, name, email, nickname, password, phone_num, address1, address2, address3, birth_year, birth_day, img_id, role) VALUES (seq_user_info.nextval, #{name}, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{password}, #{phoneNum}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{address3}, #{birthYear}, #{birthDay}, #{imgId}, 'USER')
